channel.description: Recent content in Total Blue on mattischrome

item.title: 2024 Albums of the Year #6: Total Blue, Total Blue
item.description: What do you think of when you think of the colour blue? The sea? Perhaps the sky? Maybe it makes you think of blue stones like sapphires, or flowers such as forget-me-nots? Maybe the colour blue is the glow of a phone screen on someone’s face (maybe yours) in the dark? Blue gathers at the edges of the harsh white LED light that has come to dominate our night time existence.
